RelatedSentence: Parker Royle , from Great Sankey , who was diagnosed with a rare type of prostate cancer called rhabdomyosarcoma in September , has shown his parents what a true fighter is made of , surprising doctors with his strength , courage and cheeky charm .
Mum Alexandria , aged 29 , said : The ups and downs have been hell .
This is before you start to count the intense radiotherapy , catheter insertions and the emergency visits to intensive care for kidney failure , pneumonia , septic shock and bladder spasms .
